update unit
upUnitId=#{upUnitId},
unitName=#{unitName},
header=#{header},
remark=#{remark},
where unitId=#{unitId}
mapper.select: select unitId, upUnitId, unitName, address, telephone, contactPerson, email, header, createDate, remark from unit;
select unitId, upUnitId, unitName from unit;
SELECT CONCAT("00", MAX(unitId) + 1) unitId FROM unit WHERE upUnitId=#{upUnitId}
SELECT unitId,unitName,t.upUnitId,t1.maxnum nextId FROM unit t LEFT JOIN (SELECT upUnitId,count(unitId),CONCAT("00", max(unitId) + 1) maxnum FROM unit GROUP BY upUnitId) t1 ON t.unitId = t1.upUnitId;
